Text: I broke the save backup and recovery methods in this version, so you will have to do so manually until the next version of Minecraft is released, and I have a chance to fix it.

I'm downloading with VUZeR, and its a fast download on about 7-8 minuits...  

   I'll see if it works
If you would like me to continue to update this application please let me know. Otherwise, I am considering scrapping this project.
Can we install mods on this? I own legal MC, but I need 1.2.4 to play Minecolony.
Yep! That's why I made it in the first place.

Thanks a lot for this collection, please dont scrap this project. Its very useful to have all the versions in one installer :)
You have planned the minecraft server collector pack? Or i can make with the newest server files old minecraft servers? im new on it.
Unfortunately I did not save the server's, so I need to work on finding a reliable source of server archives before I can begin anything like that. Any suggestions?
I will be updating the app in a few days to reflect the new development releases.
